name: Elixir Explorer
description:
Elixir Explorer

is a metroidvania game where you play as a potion dude. There's 4 abilities and several rooms in this game-jam demo version! 

Gamepad Controls - (Highly Recommended)
  • [Left Stick / D-Pad] - Move
  • [South Face Button] - Attack
  • [East Face Button] Jump
  • Once Unlocked
    • [West Face Button] - Special Button (Bubble, Heal)
    • [Right Bumper] - Toggle Pocket-Sized
    • [Left Trigger] - Tailwind
Keyboard Controls
  • [Arrow Keys] - Move
  • [C] - Attack
  • [X] Jump
  • Once Unlocked
    • [Z] - Special Button (Bubble, Heal)
    • [Left Shift] - Toggle Pocket-Sized
    • [Up Key] - Tailwind
  • Made for Metroidvania Month 15
  • Programming and Design by drewby
  • Art and Design by sparkhur
